code: import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles.css";import"@fontsource/inria-sans";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LoginForm(){const[rut,setRut]=useState("");const[fecha,setFecha]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/residentes",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({rut,fecha})});if(!response.ok){console.error("Error en la respuesta del servidor");return;}navigate("/dashboard?rut=".concat(rut));}catch(error){console.error("Error enviando datos:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"banner",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",style:{backgroundImage:"url('/image.png')"}})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"bienvenida",children:"\xA1Te damos la bienvenida!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"title",children:"Portal de Medicamentos ELEAM"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Ingrese RUN del residente",value:rut,onChange:e=>setRut(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:fecha,onChange:e=>setFecha(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Ingresar"})]})]})]});}
